name: template_attack 1
note:
<whole action>
immortal: targets, false
add state 54: user
wait: 20

action animation: target
wait for animation
wait for animation

if (target.hp / target.mhp <= 0)
add state 1: target
else
add state 53: target

wait for animation
action effect: target
</whole action>

<target action>
</target action>

<follow action>
remove state 54: user
clear battle log
wait: 30
remove state 53: targets
</follow action>

</follow action>
